item.title: Multi logging help
item.dc:creator: @assult46 assult46
item.description:
@assult46 wrote:

When trying to login on 2 accounts on same computer or same network it return with no response from server please try… yadadda im trying to make that possible so me and my partner can both code and test at me house… Please help i know where the error message is coming from but cannot find the source of what is causing it to return the error message.

			if(k == -1)
			{
				if(i1 == 0)
				{
					if(loginFailures < 2)
					{
						try
						{
							Thread.sleep(2000L);
						}
						catch(Exception _ex) { }
						loginFailures++;
						login(s, s1, flag);
						return;
					} else
					{
						loginMessage1 = "No response from loginserver";
						loginMessage2 = "Please wait 1 minute and try again.";
						return;
					}
				} else
				{
					loginMessage1 = "No response from server";
					loginMessage2 = "Please try using a different world.";
					return;
				}
			} else
			{
				System.out.println("response:" + k);
				loginMessage1 = "Unexpected server response";
				loginMessage2 = "Please try using a different world.";
				return;
			}
		}
